SEARCH
Package Server.Model.Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Server.Model.Player.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game. It contains information about the player's personal goal, shelf, score and online.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Player(String playerID, PersonalGoal pGoal)
    Constructs a Player object based on the provided player ID and personal goal.
